Payment should be made by payees A/C. cheques at the time of issuance of Ticket other wise markup at current banking rate will be charged, if cash payment is made an official receipt should be obtained immediately, otherwise company does not hold responsibility for payment.
CREDIT AGREEMENT FOR PASSAGE FARE AND/OR EXCESS BAGGAGE CHARGE.
I/We, the Signatory as payer hereby acknowledge receipt of the Tickets(s) mentioned above and hereby to pay all fares and charges of the said Ticket(s) I/We, hereby indemnify and agree to be jointly and severally liable with said payer for the said payment, at the time of Issuance of ticket.

As per Finance Bill 2007, Travel Agents are exempted from deduction of Tax on Sale of Tickets and there is no need to submit Exemption Certificate. [Section 153(1) & Clause 43(B) of Part IV of Second Schedule] THIS IS SYSTEM GENERATED INVOICE AND IT DOES NOT CARRY ANY SIGNATURE.
